panels.description: A report providing a weighted score of the key applications, as defined in the Settings dashboard. Key applications are marked with * and appear at the top of the list followed by applications with the highest event volume up to limit of  $limit applications in total. Score weights are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Apps: $timeRange

panels.description: A report providing a weighted score of the key code tiers, as defined in the Settings dashboard. Key code tiers are marked with * and appear at the top of the list followed by tiers with the highest event volume up to limit of  $limit tiers in total. 3rd party tiers are defined in git.io/fpPT0. Score weights are defined in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: App Tiers: $timeRange

panels.description: A report detailing anomalies detected within a given day. Use the "Applications" selector to filter information for a specific app.

styles.linkTooltip: Click to compare to previous day

panels.title: Timeline: 7d

panels.description: A report detailing providing a weighted score of the selected deployments. If no deployments are selected, the $limit most recent deployments are selected. Live deployments are marked with a *. Score weights are defined  in the Settings dashboard.
panels.title: Deployments

panels.content:
<script>

function hide(name) {
  var element = document.getElementsByClassName(name);
  
  if ((element) && (element.length == 1)) {
    element[0].style.display = 'none';
  }

}

function hideButtons() {
  hide("btn navbar-button gf-timepicker-nav-btn");
  hide("navbar-buttons navbar-buttons--zoom");
  hide("btn navbar-button navbar-button--zoom");
}

hideButtons();

</script>

current.text: Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard
current.value: Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard

list.name: settingsPostfix

options.text: Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard
options.value: Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard

list.query: Weights are defined in the Settings dashboard
